tuv.seg: The Work Placement Programme (WPP) provides 9 months’ work experience in the private, public, community and voluntary sectors for graduates and other unemployed people
Soláthraíonn an Clár Socrúcháin Oibre taithí oibre 9 mí san earnáil phoiblí, san earnáil phríobháideach agus san earnáil dheonach agus pobail do chéimithe agus do dhaoine dífhostaithe eile
The placements are for a minimum of 25 hours per week
Obair 25 uair sa tseachtain ar a laghad atá i gceist
The programme is available to people getting most social welfare payments, including Jobseeker's Allowance and Jobseeker's Benefit
Tá an clár ar fáil do dhaoine a fhaigheann an cuid is mó d'íocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh, lena n-áirítear Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist agus Sochar Cuardaitheora Poist
If you are getting a social welfare payment for at least 3 months, you may be able to keep it while on the programme - see 'Keeping your social welfare payment' below

Má tá íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh á fáil agat ar feadh 3 mhí ar a laghad, tá seans ann gur féidir leat an íocaíocht a choimeád fad is a bhfuil tú páirteach sa chlár - féach 'D'íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh a choimeád' thíos
People who are not getting a social welfare payment, or who are on a payment for less than 3 months, are eligible to take part, but will not be get a social welfare payment while on the programme
Muna bhfuil íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh á fáil agat ar feadh 3 mhí ar a laghad, ní bhfaighidh tú íocaíocht ar bith fad is a bhfuil tú páirteach sa chlár
There are 2 streams in the Work Placement Programme (WPP)
Tá 2 shruth sa Chlár Socrúcháin Oibre (CSO)
Stream 1 offers places for graduates and Stream 2 offers places for unemployed people, with a number of these places reserved for those aged under 34
Táirgeann Sruth 1 áiteanna do chéimithe agus táirgeann Sruth 2 áiteanna do dhaoine dífhostaithe. Coinnítear roinnt de na háiteanna sin do dhaoine faoi bhun aois 34
If you are an unemployed graduate, you can apply for place in either stream
Má tá céim agat, is féidir leat iarratas a dhéanamh ar an dá shruth
Placements are allocated to a region according to the number of people on the Live Register in that region and are allocated on a ‘first come, first served’ basis - see ‘How to apply’ below

Dáilfear socrúcháin ar gach réigiún de réir líon na ndaoine ar an mBeo-Chlár sa réigiún sin, agus de réir an phrionnsabail ‘tús freastail ar an duine is túisce’ - féach ‘Conas iarratas a dhéanamh’ thíos
To be eligible for Stream 1 of the Work Placement Programme you must:
Chun a bheith incháilithe do Shruth 1 an Chláir Socrúcháin Oibre:
• Have been awarded a qualification at level 7 or higher on the National Framework of Qualifications
• Caithfear cáilíocht ag leibhéal 7 nó níos airde a bheith bronnta ort ar Chreatoibre Náisiúnta na gCáilíochtaí
You do not have to be getting a social welfare payment
Ní gá duit bheith ag fáil íocaíochta leasa shóisialaigh
To be eligible for Stream 2 of the Work Placement Programme you must be unemployed
Chun a bheith incháilithe do Shruth 2 an Chláir Socrúcháin Oibre, caithfidh tú a bheith dífhostaithe
You do not have to be getting a social welfare payment
Ní gá duit bheith ag fáil íocaíochta leasa shóisialaigh
You do not have to be a graduate, but graduates can apply
Ní gá céim a bheith agat, ach is féidir le céimithe bheith páirteach sa sruth seo
Keeping your social welfare payment
D'íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh a choimeád

If you are getting a qualifying social welfare payment for at least 3 months, you may be able to keep your payment while on the Work Placement Programme, subject to the approval of the Department of Social Protection (DSP)

Má fhaigheann tú íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh incháilithe ar feadh 3 mhí ar a laghad, d'fhéadfadh d'íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh a choimeád agus tú páirteach sa Chlár Socrúcháin Oibre, faoi réir faofa na Roinne Coimirce
You must notify the Department that you are starting a placement, as this changes your status
Caithfidh tú cur in iúl don Roinn go dtosaíonn tú socrúchán, mar athraítear do stádas
Arrangements have been made to allow participants on the Work Placement Programme to sign on by post if they are claiming jobseeker's payments
Rinneadh socruithe chun rannpháirtithe ar an gClár Socrúcháin Oibre a cheadú síniú tríd an gcóras poist má tá siad ag éileamh íocaíochtaí cuardaitheora poist
As WPP is a voluntary work placement no payment from the employer is permitted
Mar is socrúchán oibre deonach é CSO, níl aon íocaíocht ón bhfostóir ceadaithe
The qualifying payments are:
Siad na híocaíochtaí atá i gceist ná:
• Widow's, Widower's or Surviving Civil Partner's Pension
• Pinsean Baintrí, Baintrí Fir nó Páirtnéara Shibhialta Mharthanaigh

If you are getting Disability Allowance, Blind Pension, Invalidity Pension or Illness Benefit you must apply to the Department of Social Protection for an exemption to start a placement on the Work Placement Programme

Más Liúntas Míchumais, Pinsean na nDall, Pinsean Easláinte nó Sochar Breoiteachta atá agat, caithfidh tú díolúine a fháil ón Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí sula ndéanann tú iarratas ar an gClár Socrúcháin Oibre
If you are on Illness Benefit you must be getting a social welfare payment for 6 months before you can apply for the programme
Má fhaigheann tú Sochar Breoiteachta, caithfidh tú íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh ar feadh 6 mhí a fháil sula bhféadann tú iarratas ar an gClár a dhéanamh
Leaving a placement to take up a job
Socrúchán a fhágáil chun glacadh le post
If you get a job during the placement you are under no obligation to stay
Má fhaigheann tú post le linn socrúcháin, níl aon cheangal ort fanacht ann
You should give the placement provider and the Department one week's notice that you are leaving
Ba chóir duit fógra seachtaine a thabhairt do sholáthraí an tsocrúcháin agus don Roinn go bhfuil tú ag fágáil
In addition, your provider may be able to employ you under the JobsPlus incentive directly from your placement
Ina theannta sin, is féidir le heagraíochtaí thú a d’fhostaigh faoin dreasacht Jobsplus díreach ó do shocrúcháin ó 1 Iúil 2013,
You must have been getting a qualifying payment prior to your placement and you must satisfy the required qualifying period and conditions
Ní mór duit íocaíocht incháilithe roimh an intéirneach a fháil agus caithfidh tú an tréimhse incháilithe agus coinníollacha riachtanacha a shásaigh
You can read more in our document on JobsPlus
Léigh tuilleadh inár gcáipéis, JobsPlus
Employers in the public, private and voluntary sectors are all eligible to participate in the Work Placement Programme
Is féidir le fostóirí san earnáil phoiblí, san earnáil phríobháideach agus san earnáil dheonach páirt a ghlacadh sa Chlár Socrúcháin Oibre
The requirements for employers providing the work placements include:
Is iad na riachtanais maidir le fostóirí a sholáthraíonn socrúcháin oibre ná:
• They must register with the DSP as a provider
• Caithfidh siad a bheith cláraithe leis an Roinn mar sholáthraí
• The maximum number of placements for each employer is 10 or 10% of the workforce, whichever is the lower
• Is é uasmhéid na socrúchán do gach fostóir ná 10 nó 10% den lucht oibre
• The placement must be for a minimum of 25 hours
• Caithfidh an socrúchán bheith ar feadh 25 uair sa tseachtain ar a laghad)
• The placement offered must not be in an area of work where there is an existing vacancy
• Ní féidir leis an socrúchán teacht in áit folúntais reatha nó é a úsáid chun fostaí reatha a easáitiú
In general, employers will be able to participate if they had no redundancies in the previous 3 months
De ghnáth, is féidir fostóirí páirt a ghlacadh mura bhfuil aon iomarcaíocht sa 3 mhí anuas
However, employers who have made people redundant in the last 3 months will still be able to participate if the number of redundancies in that period is less than 5% of the workforce
Áfach, is féidir fostóirí a rinne daoine iomarcach sa 3 mhí anuas páirt a ghlacadh, más an líon iomarcaíochta sa tréimhse sin níos lú ná 5% an lucht oibre
You can read detailed eligibility criteria for employers here (pdf)
Tá mionsonraithe na riachtanas (pdf) ar fáil
Number of placements: The maximum number of placements that an employer can offer depends on the number of full-time employee as follows:
Líon socrúchán: Braitheann an t-uasmhéid socrúchán an féidir fostóir a thairiscint, ar an líon fostaithe lánaimseartha mar a leanas:
│Number of full-time employees │Number of placements │
│Líon fostaithe │Líon socrúchán │
│Over 30 employees │10% of the workforce to a maximum of 25 places whichever is the smaller │
│Níos mó ná 30 fostaí │10% an lucht oibre suas go huasmhéid 25 socrúchán, cibé acu is lú │
The Work Placement Programme is closed to new applicants since 21 October 2016
Ansin is féidir leat iarratas a dhéanamh ar d’oifig seirbhísí fostaíochta áitiúil
